title: New Champion ability
body:
I thought of an ability thatcan create an enemy object so certain champions can interact with it. For example {{champion:55}} ,{{champion:157}} ,{{champion:45}}  or {{champion:57}}  etc... 
This can be a support champion and would be very cool to see in the game and also it would be completly new
So Riot that was my turn 
now it´s your.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Ich verstehe was kata und Yasuo damit machen können aber was will veigar oder Maokai damit.
{{champion:45}}  can ap stacken , {{champion:57}}  can dort hin dashen der champ könnte das für maoka als rückzugsmöglichkeit machen
